text: 20.25: Lu 22.25-26Kamata Jisas nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋ uraramahi payɨhu ambami, Narɨ ŋgandara. Aru miku muyɨndu haŋɨnɨŋ nurɨŋandɨ krunzaparɨm arɨŋandɨ kuyu taya indarɨmu vata tɨkatɨkatmaŋgarandu. Naŋga nurɨŋandɨ kru aru haŋɨnɨŋ, krunavundi nurɨŋandɨ kuyu sɨhanaŋga mɨŋahandamu vata, tuvɨrandu.
